Today marks the anniversary of the passage of the California Homeowner Bill of Rights. I worked to pass this bill so we could protect consumers in the wake of the financial crisis. I fought for homeowners as California’s Attorney General and will do the same as president.

Are CBP officers waking up women in the middle of sleep a “funding” problem?

Is calling migrants “filthy” “wh*res” a funding problem?
